name: Cursed Town
description:
Cursed Town is a game about the story of an old abandoned town, from the Medievo to Classic times this place has been used for many purposes. You came here to discover and solve the mystery about it. Explore the dark areas of the town, follow clues to discover the murderer, talk with inhabitants and find out a way to fight the devil that hides into the town. Your choices will affect how the story changes and how it ends.

Features.

-Control multiple characters in different eras and discover their stories.

-Follow multiple paths and unlock new areas of the map.

-Enjoy the unique Mythos horror graphics with improved effects.
